name: Luria

skills.name: Cursed Sword
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff OR a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff OR a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Level 2 Damage +5%
Level 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 4 Damage +5%
Level 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 6 Damage +10%
Level 7 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Mark of Fear
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn. Enemies killed by this skill cannot be revived.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Level 2 Damage +5%
Level 3 Damage +5%
Level 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5 Damage +10%
Level 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Hex
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Removes all buffs. Also has an 80% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Level 2 Damage +10%
Level 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 4 Damage +10%
Level 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

faction.name: Dark Elves
faction.default_description: Dark Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 42 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Dark Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 30 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Fallen from grace in their homelands of Aravia, the Dark Elves inhabit the forests that border the realms of Teleria. They see persecutions in Kaerok rather as a boon than a bane supplying them with a stream of silver. They have set up tolls for those anxious to pass safely, but woe betide those who cannot pay.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Luria is a epic attack champion from the faction Dark Elves doing spirit damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Dark Elves, Luria is a champion of Epic rarity and of Attack type
structured_data.name: Luria

default_description: Luria is a epic attack champion from the faction Dark Elves doing spirit damage
